item.description:
To celebrate our 1 year anniversary let’s do brunch and a hike in central MA.
Join us for one or both.
If you would like to car pool please email me or call me at 508-361-7978.
Brunch at Café Evolution
Sunday Nov 8th 10:00AM
Café Evolution
22 Chestnut St.
Florence, MA
#413-586-0200
http://cafe-evolution...

I haven’t been there for lunch but rumor has it that Derek Goodwin serves up the best vegan breakfast in this state.

Hike at Holyoke Range State Park
Sunday Nov 8th 1:00PM
Holyoke Range State Park
Rt. 116
Amherst, MA
#413-586-0350
http://www.mass.gov/d...

Holyoke Range State Park offers an extensive trail system leading to several beautiful views.
Let’s meet at the Notch Visitor Center.
item.name: Brunch at Cafe Evolution and Hike at Holyoke Range State Park
